item.title: Test Post
item.description: this is a post in which i’ll try out all kinds of stuff relating to hugo test quote (defun test (str) (declare ignore str) (print "Hello World")) let’s also add a heading It’s kinda impotant to know how those work aaaaand another one and wouldn’t it be handy to also test subheadings? sure! Adding an embedded tweet. https://twitter.com/einsiedlerspiel/status/1207715089224220672?s=20&t=ZFQCPYp2tQAQosb1f-vQXg Owl bet you'll lose this staring contest ðŸ¦‰ pic.twitter.com/eJh4f2zncC — San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance (@sandiegozoo) October 26, 2021 have 2!
item.content:
this is a post in which i’ll try out all kinds of stuff relating to hugo

test quote

(defun test (str)
 (declare ignore str)
 (print "Hello World"))

let’s also add a heading

It’s kinda impotant to know how those work

aaaaand another one

and wouldn’t it be handy to also test subheadings?

sure!

Adding an embedded tweet.

https://twitter.com/einsiedlerspiel/status/1207715089224220672?s=20&t=ZFQCPYp2tQAQosb1f-vQXg

Owl bet you'll lose this staring contest ðŸ¦‰ pic.twitter.com/eJh4f2zncC

— San Diego Zoo Wildlife Alliance (@sandiegozoo) October 26, 2021

have 2!

and a mastodoon post

https://todon.nl/@einsiedlerspiel/109557532922888143/

  • and more!
